description: The adversary uses a blank image as a way to abuse the image rendering mechanism for data exfiltration techniques, without actually rendering an image a victim might be suspicious about.
name: Blank Image

object_references.description: An adversary can avoid raising suspicion by avoiding rendering an image to carry exfiltrated data.
When using Image Rendering, the adversary chooses a Blank Image that cannot be rendered by the victim client, thus avoiding raising suspicion.
